thread.title: SHOCK: CBS Betrays Dems, MSM… Reveals Fact About Gorsuch That Devastates Dems
thread.title_full: SHOCK: CBS Betrays Dems, MSM… Reveals Fact About Gorsuch That Devastates Dems

author: V Saxena
title: SHOCK: CBS Betrays Dems, MSM… Reveals Fact About Gorsuch That Devastates Dems
text:
SHOCK: Photo of Mattis at Airport Goes Viral When People See He Refuses to Let Others Carry His Bags 
In fact, Gorsuch is such a die-hard and principled constitutionalist that even The Atlantic , known for its leftist bias , has praised him. 
“Neil Gorsuch, President Donald Trump’s nominee for the Supreme Court, is one of the most respected conservative legal intellectuals on the federal bench,” the outlet reported. “Like Justice Antonin Scalia, he has the ability and the ambition to lead America’s constitutional debate by following a clear vision of textualism and originalism, based on the premise that judges should separate their political from their constitutional conclusions.” 
There’s nothing to dislike about the guy, unless of course you happen to be a radically partisan hack like House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi, the San Francisco Democrat who, according to Breitbart , warned that Gorsuch is a threat to those Americans “breath air, drink water, eat food take medicine,” etc. 
By the same token, one could easily argue that listening to the demented diatribes of partisan Democrats such as Pelosi is a threat to the brain cells. 
Please share this story on Facebook and Twitter and let us know what you think about CBS News revealing to its viewers that in 2006, then-Sens Barack Obama, Joe Biden and Hillary Clinton all supported Gorsuch’s nomination to an appeals court. What do you think about CBS' honest reporting? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
